website_summaries.verdict: The Blu Vivo 5 is an attractive unlocked Android phone that offers good bang for your buck, but there are better options available for the price.

customer_reviews.title: It is the charger!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two BLU Vivo 5 phones. At about nine months we started having charging problems too. It took some trial and error but we soon discovered that the phone is not the problem. The trouble is the charger. Once the original chargers go bad, and they do. A standard off the shelve, Walmart, charger will not work with BLE phone. I Do not know why. Perhaps the rapid charging in the phone? However I did find a charger on Amazon the works. The MND 2.1 ah for $13.95.
customer_reviews.author: DaveF

customer_reviews.title: Really nice device, very good build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice device. The build quality is very good and the phone is pretty responsive. Update after a few days use. The screen anti fingerprint coating is pretty good. I did install a different launcher (Nova) as I don't like the iphone style interface. The phone charges really fast as well. Call quality is good, but I did turn of the noise reduction in call settings.
customer_reviews.author: Snorkel

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I havent had this phone for longer than 2 months and it is failing already it wont charge and when i connect it to the charger it says low battery and just shuts off. If it charges it takes HOURS to charge (6+) to reach 99%. I wouldnt recommend this for someone who uses their phone all day. At first it seems perfect, but after a a months use it stops working
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Never going to purchase BLU mobile in future :(
customer_reviews.text: I have bought BLU mobile in 2015 around June time frame which was good to use, considering that purposefully bought this mobile, but the batter backup is worst and the charging cable worst than that. Right now it is not charging at all. Spent $195 and got useless mobile, now i cannot even return this mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Murali P.

customer_reviews.title: No wifi-calling
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that if you buy this phone for the price you're sacrificing functionality, WiFii-calling is not supported on this phone. If you live in a place where you rely on Wi-Fi to get your texts and calls through this phone is not for you. It's got a pretty strange launcher but it's nothing difficult to get used too. The phone feels great in the hand and looks great to the eye. It looks like an iPhone and runs like an Android, the best of both worlds! Unfortunately I had to return it do to my dependence on Wi-Fi calling.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Changed my iphone 5s for this phone
customer_reviews.text: I changed my iPhone 5s for This phone and it is amazing, for $200 you get flagship performance, USB c gives u fast charging, gaming is excellent and the build quality is astonishing. For the people that are worried about the 720p display, let me tell u that you would love this screen it actually exceeded my expectations. Coming from a guy who's used to the iPhone display wich is pretty nice I must say Im very happy w this screen. I love this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't do a system update and you'll be set.
customer_reviews.text: Might not want to do a system update. After my brother (whom this phone was purchased for) switched out sim cards from his old phone he did a system update, and many features became unresponsive, like changing the phones wallpaper and viewing text messages. he could still send texts but he couldn't view or receive any messages. He did a factory reset and everything went back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: THE PHONE IS NOT RELIABLE. I HAD THIS PHONE FOR ABOUT 4 MONTHS AND IT WILL NOT CHARGE AT ALL . BLU CUSTOMER SERVICE DOES NOTHING TO HELP. I THINK BLU MUST HAVE A DEFECTIVE BATCH OF PHONES, BECAUSE MY CO WORKER ALSO HAD TO RETURN HER TWO PHONES DUE TO THE SAME REASON. THESE PHONES WOULD BE SO AWSOME IF THE PHONE WAS RELIABLE AND LAST. IF YOU DO PURCHASE ONE, IF THE PHONE NEEDS MORE THAN 30 MINUTES TO CHARGE RETURN IT! AMAZON IS AWSOME SO NO WORRIES ON RETURNS.
customer_reviews.author: 337connie

customer_reviews.title: Marshmallow update messed up texting
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the phone. It is very solid for a teenager, very fast and very fair for all her game apps. The only major issue, as soon as the phone updates to marshmallow you'll loose texting message capabilities. The upgrade gets rid of text message default program and install Google texting app. My daughter is using whatsup to text but not all her friends use, so very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Saara Castilho

customer_reviews.title: Very solid build and awesome features.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it. Very solid build and awesome features. UPDATE...11/21/16, this phone started shutting off on its own a week ago and now it will not fully charge and stops at about 7% which does not last very long at all. So now I am thinking this was not a very good deal after all. UPDATE....12/07/16, Phone will not charge at all now. This turned out to be a disaster after just three months and without a removable battery my daughter is stuck with a paperweight, a 200.00 one at that. Time to go with a much better brand.
customer_reviews.author: billy waters

customer_reviews.title: The phone turnned off and never comeback again
customer_reviews.text: I bought Blu phones two times. I got amazed by the quality looking. So thin and the camera is amazing. Everything with Blu VivoAir is a should buy when you compare the lower price. BBBBUUUUUUT STOP! THE FIRST PHONE WAS WORKING NORMAL, NO COMPLAIN, I WAS TRAVELING OVERSEAS, AS SOON AS I GOT IN THE PLANE, THE PHONE TURNED OFF. IT NEVER COME BACK SINCE THEN. NO ONE WANT REPARE IT, THEY SAY ITS NOT KNOWN. Still, Im too much in love with this phone. I did another purchase . 2 months later, the phone turned off and never accept charge. I ended up buying a Sumsung 8 note. Im still working very fine and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sana Ait habibi

customer_reviews.title: Blu,the new phone for me!
customer_reviews.text: This device DOES NOT FAIL TO DELIVER!!I wish I could have waited before I bought a discontinued Nexus 6 new.Fast on uptake.Looks like a slightly thinner Iphone4s or 5s.Fools everybody.Now the display could be better with a 1080 x 920,but it works well.Great battery life ,Full days worth,easy. Mediate processor fast!Plays videos and games with ease.For or 200 duckets U.S.,I don't think you can buy a better phone.If you are reading BLU,put a full HD display on your production line and it will be unbeatable!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, it has great picture, whether you are taking or receiving them. It super for text messages. The phone itself works just fine. The price was great. I have friends who have super $$$ expensive phones and they say mine is just as good as there's. I use it as a Trac Fond, it does well with that, the hardest part was setting it up. Tracfone wasn't a lot of help, I ended up using directions a friend downloaded from the site. I've had a hard time getting a case for it, I've ordered one but it comes from China. Doesn't come with SIM or SD card. But I'd tell friends to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: shannon Y

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing especially for the price. It's almost unbelievable this phone is only $200.00 I am (was) a galaxy type of guy, my daughter is strictly iPhone, with that being said...... I am no longer a Samsung supporter. Wayyyyy over priced.... My wife had the note 5 and this phone is just as good. No complaints here. Battery life awesome. Lasts 2 + days if not streaming videos. 1 full day if streaming. Camera is good. Phone looks awesome... People think its an iPhone... Overall this phone is worth $200.00 actually it's worth $600.00 no lie. No regrets. I will Def keep up with the Blu beans from now on....
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed with this one. Just lacking in some of the critical aspects that I purchased the phone based on. The camera might be 13mp, but the pictures are constantly out of focus and of poor quality. I've tried every mode possible and still the pics are poor. The battery life isn't as good I might expect. It is good for about 3/4 day, but I still have to charge. It does charge very rapidly. My main complaint is that the phone compresses images for sending texts. My photos look really strange when I send them. I also have trouble with various apps.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia D.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for $200
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Galaxy S3 to this phone and for $200 I got more than I've ever wanted; big display, no lag, good camera, great for reading novels, great for browsing the www. Got it with version 5 lolypop or whatever it is and last night I got the notification to upgrade to Marshmallow 6 and the phone works great with it. Battery life is also great and if used as a regular phone(talk/text only) one charge will last me 3 days. . . With heavy internet usage it will only go down to probably 60% battery after a whole day of usage. All in all its a great phone for $200.
customer_reviews.author: Garza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent on Tmobile
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for Tmobile Customers. Dont just go by short reviews or specs. Check this thread for one users experience in real life [...]
customer_reviews.author: digitalk

customer_reviews.title: "Great display and sound, fast enough for everything we have thrown at it."
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this phone. The only thing she would say anything negative about is that the power button and the volume buttons being on the same side and laid out quite oddly if I say so myself. She sometimes puts the phone asleep when trying to volume up or down but since has gotten used to it. She recommends this phone to anyone on a budget. Great display and sound, fast enough for everything we have thrown at it.
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: BLU is BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Bought the phone for my son & am very impressed with. Beautiful, solid, lightweight, great specs - 32gb & 3gb ram- wonderful for the price. I did read some reviews elsewhere regarding screen resolution & brightness, but looks beautiful to us. If you want to spend $700 for an iPhone or Samsung, that's fine, but for $500 less, damn this is good phone. BLU just keeps getting better, releasing new phones on somewhat regular basis. Very impressed by this phine
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pawlak

customer_reviews.title: Battery is the best feature, great phone for price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought phone for sister. So far so good. Been a few months of use. Camera is good enough for daily use, snaps and other social. The best thing about it is the battery. I use a Nexus 5 and VS this phones battery it loses. Battery last all day with moderate use. It probably 30-40% longer than my Nexus 5. Lots of bonus items come in the box like a basic case and screen protector, so difficulty to place it on the phone. Apart from that is a very good mid-tier phone Only complain is a spec of dust under the screen, only noticeable when screen is off.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Parra

customer_reviews.title: Almost had me....but they BLU it :-(
customer_reviews.text: Amazing design. Looks and feels like a flagship phone. Speed is great. Screen is very good (too bad it's 720). Battery and charging times are fantastic. Call quality is great. Why three stars? It does not support T-Mobile 4G LTE and the 4G bands it does cover are unusability slow. I really, really, really wanted to love this phone, but lack of LTE bands killed it for me. If fast speeds are not a priority to you, and you want a beautiful, snappy, functional, power sipping phone, then consider this review five stars.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!!!!!!!!!!!! Great smartphone
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it!!!!!!!!!!!!! Great smartphone at a great price. already had it for three weeks, amazing result. Camera is great. people who wrote the pictures are not good, because, they didn't take them on HDR picture mode. yes the picture looks great on Phone as the phone has a great resolution screen. The focus mode picture is also great. Only con I would say is the battery area gets heated up on usage, especially on GPS mode. Think its same problem Motorola had when they came out of Razr first time. Overall a great phone to have, without breaking your budget. Friends usually ask me if it was the new Iphone. Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kash

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a $700 smartphone when you could have a Blu Vivo 5
customer_reviews.text: This phone is crazy considering the price it got. Let alone the other specs of this phone, there are great. Let's talk the battery life. It could last one and a half day per full charge with normal use. I've had this for about 3 months, I absolutely love it. It's beautiful, it's thin and it's awesome. Who needs a $700 smartphone when you could have a Blu Vivo 5 that could do everything that those super pricey smartphones do. Worth the purchase, so far. Thumbs up BLU!
customer_reviews.author: Afin Fadzlin

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish this phone was still available!! I love this. I have yet to find a lot of the same features on these new "higher end" devices. I guess it got discontinued because I bought mine for $150 (not including tax) and now it's over $300.
customer_reviews.author: Hidaya

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad alternative to the more expensive choices
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a cheapo Android that ended up croaking on its own. Holds a charge well and the OS is easy to use. Reminds me of the iOS. It is fairly light and one hand use is tricky and kind of risky also. 3gb ram is really 1.5gb but still I haven't had any problem with lag etc. Only complaint is no 3rd party accessories and I suggest keeping the Slim case on it. Mine did not come with a screen protector on it but had one in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bosquez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best phone wife has ever had loved the battery life, it is now a few months later my wife still loves her phone it is faster than our home computer it is amazing how fast it is. My whole family has switched over to Blu phones, I have had my own phone for 6 months no issues. I have not been compensated for my review I doubt you can find better phones for the money. I am just giving an honest opinion some of the best purchases I have made have been Blu products. I will never go back to purchasing phones from my carrier ever again
customer_reviews.author: jdov1968

customer_reviews.title: If u don't want spend money on a iPhone or Samsung this is the phone for you .👍👍
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome phone for the price 199.99 I use it every day for WhatsApp & Instagram and I most say it's a beautiful design with the gold . The only thing I didn't like was it can't use 5g wifi which suck but my home wifi support 2.4g which is a slow for me .
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing, for a low cost, The display is brilliant, sharp, crisp, the speakers sound like theatre style,super loud, fast charging, slim, it does and has what an expensive phone does. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Would Highly Recommend this Phone
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this phone about a week ago and I have been blow away with both its design and performance. I honestly think BLU is revolutionizing the phone market by offering phones like this one with such great specifications for so cheap. This phone rivals the iPhone 6 in speed and design for a fraction of the cost. This is much better investment for your money than almost any other phone on the market right now. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still works great
customer_reviews.text: It's been years since I got this phone for my mom and she still uses it. While updates are not sent as quick, the device takes good pics and operates at a good speed
customer_reviews.author: Customer876

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It runs just like any of my other androids I have had and it is a fraction of the price. I would definitely purchase this phone again. Cell phones are getting ridiculously expensive lately so it is nice to see alternatives for so much cheaper. Also this phone always seems to go on sale so wait for it to go back down to 200 if you see it posted for more
customer_reviews.author: Litljewels

customer_reviews.title: best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life,nice design this phone has everything and its a budget phone,definetly recomend.....update review,I loved my phone but I broke the screen before I find nice screen protector,I can not find any replacement,I will try little more and definitely I will order new one soon
customer_reviews.author: Mursel ilker

customer_reviews.title: Better than my high expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Bought it used and its extremely clean and quick. Much faster than I anticipated and I'm guessing it's because of the 3GBs of RAM and 8core processor. Screen is beautiful and my colleagues thought it was comparable to an iPhone 6s+ due to size and quality. Was worried about it working with ATT but I ran it against a friends iPhone 5s also on ATT and it beat it. Only thing I don't like is the vibrate while typing. I've turned it off I'm settings but it's still vibrating. If someone has a solution to this please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: PadenDG

customer_reviews.title: When it arrived it came in a beautiful box, with 2 screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a deal. I needed a phone right away & checked out pre-owned. This was supposedly barely acceptable, would arrive in original packaging, which was damaged, & the phone itself had scratches on the glass. When it arrived it came in a beautiful box, with 2 screen protectors, a phone protector, earbuds, charger, & not a scratch to be found! The phone is impressive, gorgeous color, high end in every way. The best money I've spent in a year!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone a couple of months ago and wanted to wait before leaving a review. So far it's been one of the best smart phones I've ever owned. Replaced my Galaxy S6 and I honestly have not missed it since :)
customer_reviews.author: DrGonzo_201

customer_reviews.title: so I can't say a bad thing about it
customer_reviews.text: I did all the research I could on this phone before getting it, every YouTube video, so I can't say a bad thing about it, everything works just as it should, I'm not a heavy cell phone user so 32gb was great, battery last all day, I enjoy the screen, sometime in the near future the bands probably will be a issue, but I'll have had it awhile and it will be time to replace!, for now I love it,
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've owned so far. Really well done in all aspects. New charge port is convenient. Design and performance have been top notch for six months now. I've dropped this several times (on the sidewalk) and have not had any serious damage (yet). This phone has really impressed me. Battery still lasts all day and haven't had any issues with bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Mleebee

customer_reviews.title: Great phone very fast great camera looks feels and runs ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone very fast great camera looks feels and runs like a $600 to $700 phone this is my third Blu phone over the past 4years and this is by far the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: The phone is excellent, but it has only one detail
customer_reviews.text: The phone is excellent, but it has only one detail, the USB cable is poor quality and after a few months the phone does not charge fast and does not exceed the battery charge by 50%. However I recommend it, as it is a good and economic phone.
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo

customer_reviews.title: They are all very good phones, but the blu vivo 5 stands out
customer_reviews.text: I started using Blu phones because I became sick and tired of replacing my IPhone screens. Ive had many blu phones. They are all very good phones, but the blu vivo 5 stands out, and it deserves 5 stars. Im going to keep it sweet and simple.The phone looks beautiful, and feels great in your hands. It also performs beautifully. You can run several apps at once, without any hangups or crashes. This phone is just as good as any Samsung or Apple phone ,For way less than half the price. If your on the edge contemplating buying it. GO FOR IT
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone except notification volume
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone to use on Straight Talk and replace my broken LG G2. I loved my G2, and thus phone is really a good replacement. It's a bit bigger but it is slightly lighter. Performance is good and I am very pleased with my purchase. The only down side is that the notifications volume is tied to the ring volume, which is very annoying. That is the only reason that I gave 4 stars instead of 5. Also the user interface is kind of like an iPhone. I hate iPhone. Just a minor annoyance. I would recommend to a friend, but I would warn about notifications issue
customer_reviews.author: geminigirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value phone with high end features
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Has great specs, great looking, and great quality at a much more affordable price than the Icon phones that some folks spend way too much money on. It has a large , bright and clear screen, good sound and just an overall great phone. A great alternative to the bank buster phones.Have had not one issue with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful phone and runs smoothly, but the screen came with three small defects. They look like pinpricks and are very distracting. Wish I could return it, but I'm overseas and someone just brought it to me. Also, it doesn't seem as though you can use a nano sim card and a memory card at the same time. Had I known this before purchasing, I would've gone with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK.
customer_reviews.text: I am mostly happy with this phone. I've had it for almost a year and it's OK. I've been fairly careful with it, but finally dropped it on my driveway, with the case that comes with it on it, and the "gorilla glass" screen broke. Then a few days ago I had to do a factory reset on it because it kept freezing up.
customer_reviews.author: N. Pennetta

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: After one year of use that cell phone don't turn on. I'm very very sad....
customer_reviews.author: Irina Mostovaya

customer_reviews.title: Great phone if you have a good case for it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone less than 5 months ago. First of all, I LOVED IT. Besides the occasional need to reboot or trouble with touch recognition, it's an amazing phone for the price. I recommended it to everyone I know. But, after a few months of use, my first drop came, which was also my last. One small drop broke the thing to an unusable state. If you are going to get this phone, make sure you get a good case for it, or you're gonna have to dish out another 200 bucks in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This phone took a while to ship, but when I got it I almost cried out it was so beautiful. The color is gold, but in certain lights it has a pink champagne look. Very classy, and it works amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Totally recomend!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this phone for 2 months, and have NO complaints. It's a great phone for the price, and I've had no issues with compatibility or any of the apps I've been accustomed to using. The battery life is long, and the camera makes great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sosebee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and nice smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: Is an excellent device but it was abandoned by blu. It got stucked on android marshmallow. Repair parts are expensive if you can find them. Luckily I was able to replace the lcd screen 3 times but a huge cost.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Phone did not work straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I've had one Blu phone before purchasing this Blu vivo 5. It was used but said "like new" condition. I was bummed to see the screen had scratches and when I went to turn it on it was dead. Tried charging for over two hours with no luck. Hopefully these items get tested before sending them out.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever!! I will say this may help some people with straight talk. At first when I put my micro sim card in I didn't get the full benefits. All I could do was just make phone calls and text no internet.. I did a factory data reset and that for some reason worked and turned it on!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan c

customer_reviews.title: this phone was a good for 3 months until i drop it i drop ...
customer_reviews.text: this phone was a good for 3 months until i drop it i drop it on a tile floor and it denned the metal the phone was still working but a broken screen however when i tried to straighten out the metal the screen started to go black ... so now it is TOTALLY black a digitizer / screen cost $150 which i refuse to buy for a phone that cost $200 However the phone was great but i hated the marshmallow update
customer_reviews.author: Shae-Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had my phone for nearly 5 months now. It's a pretty decent phone. The camera is good when the lighting is good. Dim lighting...Pictures are a no. Last week my phone started slow charging. It will barely hold a charge and will not charge over 25-30%. I took the phone to a repair shop hoping it was the cord. Unfortunately it is the battery, ALREADY. I never over charge it, give it a break, and I take care of the phone pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful cell phone I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful cell phone I recommend, I'm Brazilian. I only saw with a little problem with the defective recharger, it has to be replaced. I stayed with him stopped for 6 months thinking to be defective in the device, more researching I discovered that the problem was in the load and soon I came back to use. very top this cell taking this little problem.
customer_reviews.author: alfredoborges

customer_reviews.title: Amazing budget phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is an insane performer for its price tag, the phone is elegant and very solid feeling in the hand. I have had this phone for about a month now and all the bugs and minor discrepancys that have been talked about in reviews.the only issue I have with the phone is that with the stock silicone case and the aftermarket cases the headphone Jack is not fully accessible and you have to remove it to get too it. If you wanted too you could just cut it so it's very minor. Love this phone, can't wait for blus next release
customer_reviews.author: IReapZz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the phone. I normally don't post reviews. Love the full metal body design and finish. Gotten lot of compliments. After a year and half of use, battery lasts a bit less, but that's expected. Waiting for a newer model to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: houlnx

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone the OS is a little weird at first (no app tray) I fixed by downloading Nova launcher comes with everything. I gave it 4 stars for the lack of Case's for it and to be honest this is something Blu has to work on. I bought this phone because I dropped my other blu vivo 5 and cracked the screen, I did think about buying a different phone but I'm to in love with the performance and build quality of this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 14months old still works as day unwrapped
customer_reviews.text: 1st phone purchasd May2016 & 2nd June2016 for spouse. Best phones we ever had. No problem with charging at all. Phone is now 14months old... and if it wasnt due to I have dropped it from 4-6feet over 10times the phone would be just as the day I unwrapped it.
customer_reviews.author: Melenero

customer_reviews.title: Would have given 5 stars, but product was advertised ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars, but product was advertised as upgradable to Marshmallow, and as is typical of BLU, no update in sight. Now Android N is upcoming. Phone itself is stellar.. also typical of BLU :)
customer_reviews.author: Sooner

customer_reviews.title: Great unlock phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great unlock phone for the price, works well, dual sim . Purchase it over a month now and it does everything ok so far no issues,
customer_reviews.author: g-man

customer_reviews.title: Battery life kind of sucks but it is a nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Battery life kind of sucks but it is a nice phone. The headphones where not sent with phone. Still trying to adjust to the phone
customer_reviews.author: Juan Cintron

customer_reviews.title: ... while this VIVO 5 does the same n perhaps better. Buying for my mother in law as her ...
customer_reviews.text: Why spend an arm n a leg for an iPhone while this VIVO 5 does the same n perhaps better.Buying for my mother in law as her birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dubz 🐻🇹🇿

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great iPhone -like phone. Purchased a Huawei mate 2 prior to this phone. The functionality of the software the phone build is far better. The colors are rich will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Quite Nice For The Price ,, BLU
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a while now as my primary phone.. I like it, however, I do feel sometimes the Bluetooth signal is a bit weak in comparison to my Note3 and Maxwest phones.. But it is sleek and full of great default features. Nice for the Price.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The charger for these phones are not good, its not a good buy if the charger ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this phone in April and actually start using it in May the features are very unique and can do lots of things especially the camera settings. Since August I realize the phone is not charging the battery charge stood at 47% for a while , while the charger is still plugged in, it continued for a while until it only charge up 13% then out it went. The charger for these phones are not good, its not a good buy if the charger are not going to last as long as the phone. I am in the Caribbbean and my phone is not working I cannot get a charger to fit the phone aweful
customer_reviews.author: deniese

customer_reviews.title: A truly excellent piece of engineering.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels gorgeous. Very difficult to overload. Great battery life. Lots of great little things (volume scaling at the start of a song, glove compatibility etc) AND ALL FOR JUST $200 This truly spars with the flagships, it's another Atom. STRONGLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied User

customer_reviews.title: Impresive phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. It is extremely fast, good size, eventhough the resolution is just 720 it looks pretty nice. It came with all the goodies (cover, screen protector, nice headphones). The only downside is that in the picture the phone looks all grey but when I got it the front is actually white.
customer_reviews.author: Erick C.

customer_reviews.title: No 4G outside the U.S
customer_reviews.text: No 4G/LTE outside the United States because the phone uses 4G band of 900. BLU should take this into consideration and provide options to the buyer However, this is a great phone!
customer_reviews.author: aladdin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smartphone in competitive price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome smartphone in competitive price. Very friendly Android. That phone I bought for my 78 yo mom. She use very easy. Fast processor, big memory extended to 64 GB. She reading ebooks and watching broadcasting TV in internet. Very good product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Peter Madzia

customer_reviews.title: Great life
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for years and always go back to it. It would be nice if blu issued an upgrade for android. Otherwise, is still be using this phone as my regular.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I am personally very disappointed with the Blu Vivo 5
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with the Blu Vivo 5. Started off working fantastic. However, after 3 months started having problems with the battery as well as the battery charger. I find it extremely funny how it starts to malfunction right after the return time frame has passed. Very disappointed with the Blu Vivo 5. Highly recommend that no one purchased this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Matias

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing looking phone has and does everything you need it to do and more.. it has the looks and the storage and the power to run any app an game.. fixing to be six month with it. An zero problems.. I recommend it to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: rene guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I started having battery and charging issues within 4 months of purchasing this product. I just got frustrated and bought another phone. FYI the warranty for the battery is only 6 months after purchase! I didn't look it up until after the 6 month period.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great. Very fast processing . Crisp clear calls. Only complaint is the sound could be louder and they dont make a otter box type case for it yet. The only phone cases available either need to me modyfied to fit or flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Mojoman

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as an iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone from Blu! This is my first unlocked phone and am very impressed at how well this phone keeps up with my iPhone 6 Plus.It does everything I need on a day to day basis including gaming, email, fb, ig, etc. I would recommend it to anyone trying to get out of their contract or just looking for a good phone at a low price. Much appreciated Blu!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Blu vivo 5
customer_reviews.text: The quick charge capability does work after some time and after using it for about 2 month or less the battery quality has decreased significantly..... It takes very long to charge and dies within a couple of minutes
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone! I have been using it now for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone! I have been using it now for over a month now. Battery life is good on this phone. Charges quickly. Screen sharpness is really good, considering its 720p resolution. For a 200 dollar phone it has really good specs and it performs well in real life.
customer_reviews.author: Jetally

customer_reviews.title: It is super fast phone
customer_reviews.text: It handles mult apps at once good and storage was good but mine didnt charge good at all very slow and not well made in the charging dept so i returned mine
customer_reviews.author: Shari Grand

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for its price! Excellent build, feels like a premium phone. Screen resolution is average, but the phone overall is very snappy. Comes with whole lot of accessories, again saving you money. I would recommend over other phone >$200.
customer_reviews.author: Dipanshu

customer_reviews.title: Great low priced smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I need and more. Doesn't do 5 Ghz WiFi
customer_reviews.author: Pete F,

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, Great price, Good luck finding one.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is really nice and loaded for $200. Pretty sure you cant do better for the price. The demand for this phone seems high, yet it is really hard to find a new one anywhere. Not sure why. If you can find one though, get it!
customer_reviews.author: ebeck

customer_reviews.title: Better then vivo 8
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this phone till I got it wet and couldn't get it replaced. I got the vivo 8 thinking it will be even better then 5 but I was wrong 😣 so wrong I hate vivo 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed expectations
customer_reviews.text: Still using this phone its been 2 years and its my daly driver... Blue vevo 5 is very durable and efficient. For the price I must say I wasn't expecting this. Very good. Only one lil problem the speakers are low when on speaker during a call.
customer_reviews.author: Jahni Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, amazing company!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone! I was having some issues right away with the phone so I contacted Blu directly and they responded fairly quickly, I ended up sending my phone to them and it was returned rather quickly fixed and working how I expected it to work originally. I am satisfied with the phone and pleased with the customer service for fixing my phone and getting me back in touch so painlessly. Forever grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... cheap feel to them and the screens resolution was terrible but i saw all the good reviews on this ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought blus in the past and they all had a cheap feel to them and the screens resolution was terrible but i saw all the good reviews on this new model so i bought one and i love it its all metal its feels like a iphone and that screen looks so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This phone is excellent its just right for me knowing it cost under ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is excellent its just right for me knowing it cost under $200.......I like the extended screen shot and the fact that i can record phone calls conversations plus the fake call is awesome knowing it can get u out of a situation
customer_reviews.author: Man

customer_reviews.title: Why spend over $600 for a phone if you can have this one for half the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Great looking clear screen, good camera, awesome sound. This gives me 4G LTE with T-Mobile. The only knock is that there's no fingerprint sensor. This is as good a $200 phone you can have.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, in fact I gave up my iphone 6, and this one is better in many ways - bigger screen, memory, and google android 5.1 just made it so much easier since I have been using google chrome browser and all the settings are there when I log on to my google account. It is so much simpler and easier! Plus, I can believe the price - $199?? It is a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say thank you BLU, for making the best phone ever, I just got it and I love it, the design is extremely beautiful, the phone works super quick, the resolution OMG the resolution is amazing, the camera from outside this world it takes the best pictures, well if you are looking for the perfect phone with the perfect price, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed. It is a great phone to have. Thin and light and full of wonderful features. Tech support is a little slow in responding to my question but the it does not detract from the phone itself. Now if BLU can update it to the latest Android operating system, I'll give it 6 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone... Lots of features... Great screen resolution. Buy it you will be extremely satisfied . I have owned iPhone.. Samsung.. Motorola.. LG.. and others. This is the best one yet!
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone! Feels good in your hand; thin yet a little wide. The gold color is nice, screen glass is durable, for sure. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: marques phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a great phone... light in weight, big screen and works well...
customer_reviews.author: George Vassiliades

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the physical phone itself. It just didn't have a band needed for my cell carrier. Will buy another blu phone in the future. Sleek and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Dori Davis

customer_reviews.title: I like this phone even though it doesn't have all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone even though it doesn't have all the bells and whistles. What I need a simple smart phone with a reasonable price. This is it. It has 3GB Ram and runs fast. The camera mega pixel is the same as Samsung Galaxy. The screen resolution is not as high, but the quality of the actual photos are important.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: I think this phone is the best in this price
customer_reviews.text: I think this phone is the best in this price, I had an issue connecting headphones in smartphone while had a case on it and for this, i got 40 dollar refund. so don't believe people who are writing about some defects of the phone and saying that they were ignored by amazon. and didn't recieve refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No. One
customer_reviews.text: This is one fine phone it's like a combination of Android and iPhone, works flawlessly. I would not trade it for any on the market.
customer_reviews.author: etwh9

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price for a fantastic phone with all the bells and whistles that's not locked to a carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Osmars

customer_reviews.title: great phone, great features
customer_reviews.text: great phone, great features, good battery life. I don't like that you have to have a key to get the sim in and out, its easy to lose and its a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: the price is worth is any ways I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: the price is worth is any ways I bought it for 200 it increased but it is worth it total replica of iPhone 6 plus. 3 GB ram.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BLU VIVO 5 Smartphone -5.5" 4G LTE GSM Unlocked - 32GB +3GB RAM - Silver
product_meta.description: Introducing BLU Vivo 5 is the Fifth generation device in the Vivo Series available in white-silver and solid Gold
feature_bullets: Aesthetically engineered full body metal design, 5.5" display + vivid HD AMOLED Color+ Corning Gorilla glass 3; with Immediate Upgrade to Android 6.0 Marshmallow via OTA
32GB Internal memory 3GB RAM and Micro SD up to 64GB
13MP Main Camera with LED flash and 5MP Selfie Camera with Wide Angle + PDAF technology and Blue lens
MediaTek 6753 64-Bit 1.3GHz Octa Core Processor with MALI-T720 GPU

4G LTE, (2/4/7), 4G HSPA+ (850/1700/1900/2100). GSM Quad band: US compatibility Nationwide on all GSM Networks including AT&T, T-Mobile, Cricket, MetroPCS, Straight Talk, Pure Talk USA, and others. Please refer the User manual before use.
Please have customers Contact customer service
